thread.title: Salt Bae Just Made A Kobe Beef Cheeseburger And I’ve Never Wanted To Eat Something So Bad In My Life
thread.title_full: Salt Bae Just Made A Kobe Beef Cheeseburger And I’ve Never Wanted To Eat Something So Bad In My Life

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Salt Bae Just Made A Kobe Beef Cheeseburger And I’ve Never Wanted To Eat Something So Bad In My Life
text:
Salt Bae is one of those Internet sensations I don’t think I’m ever really going to get sick of. Sure he’s a one-trick pony, but I don’t think I’m going to ever get stick of his schtick in this case because it combines high theater, food, and swag. The dude is and always will be a demi-god if you love eating and red meat and the finer things in life. Eating at his restaurant is on my bucket list. He’s probably the finest master swordsmen to ever go viral .
Today he’s back with a cheeseburger. But this is salt bae, so it’s not your every day cheeseburger — It’s a Kobe Beef burger, mashed with love in a meat grinder. This little trick is pure culinary poetry in motion:
The Kobe (beef) of no-looker jumpers. pic.twitter.com/AO52mGvkn7 
— BroBible (@BroBible) March 23, 2017 

I’ve never wanted a cheeseburger so bad in my life.

LOOK HOW GOOD THIS LOOKS 

Side note: I think this is my favorite Salt Bae effort to date, even after the burger. The part where he does the knife twirl with that small piece of meat gets me giggling every time.

Never leave my life, Salt Bae:
